All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminDashboardController
The AdminDashboardController class controls the functionality of the admin dashboard.
AdminLoginDashboardController
The AdminLoginDashboardController class controls the functionality of the admin login dashboard.
AdminLoginLevelEditorController
The AdminLoginLevelEditorController class controls the functionality of the admin login for level editor.
Answer
The Answer class represents a possible answer in a quiz.
AudioPlayer
Manages audio playback, including sound effects and background music Supports looping and the ability to load audio from specified file paths
AudioPlayer.SoundEffect
 
AudioThread
The AudioThread class provides a threaded mechanism for playing audio.
BubsFancyButton
The BubsFancyButton class represents a custom styled button.
BubsFancyButtonBorder
The BubsFancyButtonBorder class represents a custom styled button.
BubsFancyInstructionBackButton
The BubsFancyInstructionBackButton class represents a custom styled button.
ChallengeGameSceneController
Controller class for the game scene.
EditCharacterController
Controller class for handling the editing of character outfit.
EditUserController
Controller class for the Edit User scene.
FirstEditCharacterController
Controller class for the first edit character scene.
FirstEditUserController
Controller class for the first user profile creation/editing scene.
GameSceneController
Controller class for the game scene.
InstructionController
Controller class for handling instructions UI.
LeaderboardController
Controller class for the leaderboard view.
Level
Represents a level in the game, containing information such as time allowed, starting monster health, category, number of stages, and question sets.
LevelMakerController
Controller for the Level Maker GUI.
MainMenu
The main class that launches the application and loads the main scene.
MainSceneController
Controller class for the main scene.
Monster
Represents a monster in the game.
Outfit
Represents an outfit with components such as hat, face, and shirt.
Player
Represents a player in the game.
Question
Represents a multiple-choice question.
QuestionGenerator
This class generates arithmetic questions with multiple-choice answers.
QuestionSet
Represents a set of questions.
SandboxFX
A simple JavaFX application demonstrating sprite animation.
SpriteAnimation
A custom animation class for sprite animations.
Start
 
User
Represents a user in the system.
User.CurrentUser
Represents the current user.
Utils
Utility class containing common methods and constants.
